publication.title: CapRe: a Gaze Tracking System in Man-machine Interaction
publication.jconf: Journal of Advanced Computational Intelligence and Intelligent Informatics
publication.abstract: We present a real-time camerabasedsystem designed for gaze tracking focusedon human-computer communication.We aim to equip computer systems with a toolwhich can provide visual information aboutthe user. This tool must satisfy interactionconstraints and be not intrusive. Thereforewe use a CCD camera, placed between thekeyboard and the screen. The system detectsthe user presence, locates and then tracks hisface, nose and both eyes.
